lines.text: We pay taxes, we vote, I think it's time we came out of the damned coffin!
You make things for sale Eli, you invent corruption.

And don't you ever sell it short Harry, corruption is the last untapped resource of pure energy on the planet. It feeds the market. It drives the economy. Corruption empowers Harry and absolute corruption empowers absolutely.
You know Eli, it's guys like you that are sucking the life out of this country.
Vampire is such an ugly word! Don't let me hear you say that again. We're Carpathian-Americans!
You've been slipping it to the Pillsbury Doughgirl!
The taste for the melodramatic comes from too much inbreeding.
She's a twinky, all blonde and sticky and full of white goo. But, you know what I'm full of Harry.
Do I live forever? If I bite someone, do they become one of us?
Where'd you pick up all this crap? Didn't your parents teach you anything?
